about_the_game:
Frank West is home for the holidays and he’s got a naughty list the size of Willamette. Tear up the streets Santa-style in this festive carnage pack that’s guaranteed to stuff your stocking. Includes holiday themed weapons, vehicles, costumes and holiday themed zombies!
Frank West asks, have you been naughty or have you been nice, invites you to play Dead Rising 4 twice, with zombie themed elves and gingerbread men, Come on and let the slay ride begin.
detailed_description:
Frank West is home for the holidays and he’s got a naughty list the size of Willamette. Tear up the streets Santa-style in this festive carnage pack that’s guaranteed to stuff your stocking. Includes holiday themed weapons, vehicles, costumes and holiday themed zombies!
Frank West asks, have you been naughty or have you been nice, invites you to play Dead Rising 4 twice, with zombie themed elves and gingerbread men, Come on and let the slay ride begin.
name: Dead Rising 4 - Holiday Stocking Stuffer Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card
